title: benefit of storing call session information

content.question: Which of the following is most likely to be a benefit of storing the information from each calling session in a database?

choices.label: The company can analyze the calling session data and thereby make better business decisions.
The company can ensure that customer information is protected from misuse.
The company can reduce the costs associated with data storage.
The company can reduce its need for data compression.

content.answer: The company can analyze the calling session data and thereby make better business decisions.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Describe the impact of a computing innovation.
